definitions.definition: A sauce, made of an acidic liquid such as vinegar or lemon juice; oil; and other ingredients, used as a salad dressing, or as a marinade for cold meats .
A small perforated box for holding aromatic vinegar contained in a sponge, or a smelling bottle for smelling salts
A small, two-wheeled vehicle, like a litter , to be drawn or pushed by a person. They were used in France until the late 18th century.
Alternative form of vinegret ( “ type of Russian salad ” ) .

main_definition: A sauce, made of an acidic liquid such as vinegar or lemon juice; oil; and other ingredients, used as a salad dressing, or as a marinade for cold meats .
secondary_definitions: ( obsolete ) A small perforated box for holding aromatic vinegar contained in a sponge, or a smelling bottle for smelling salts
( historical ) A small, two-wheeled vehicle, like a litter , to be drawn or pushed by a person. They were used in France until the late 18th century.
Alternative form of vinegret ( “ type of Russian salad ” ) .
